name: CTTelephonyNetworkInfo
desc: An object that provides notifications of changes to the user’s cellular service provider.

items.name: var serviceCurrentRadioAccessTechnology: [String : String]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing the current radio access technology registered to each service.

items.name: var serviceSubscriberCellularProviders: [String : CTCarrier]?
items.desc: A dictionary that contains carrier information about each service.

items.name: var serviceSubscriberCellularProvidersDidUpdateNotifier: ((String) -> Void)?
items.desc: A block dispatched when there are updates to the user’s cellular provider information for any service.

items.name: var dataServiceIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier of the service that’s currently providing data.

items.name: var delegate: CTTelephonyNetworkInfoDelegate?
items.desc: An object that the system notifies when the data service identifier changes.
